title: Villa Farallon — Punta Aguila 22 — Casa de Campo
address: Punta Aguila 22, Casa de Campo, La Romana, Provincia de La Romana, República Dominicana
description: Dream property facing the sea in Casa de Campo. Built on a 6,894 m² sea-front lot with 3,493 m² of construction. Features include a 4,000 sq ft master suite, spa, gym, home theater, discotheque, and turnkey operation with all furnishings included.
